elements.expression:
! (ecrecover(bytes32,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)(sha3()(Ethereum Signed Message:
32,tradeHash),v,r,s) == user && block.number <= expires && safeAdd(orderFills[tradeHash],amount) <= amountBuy && tokens[tokenBuy][msg.sender] >= amount && tokens[tokenSell][user] >= safeMul(amountSell,amount) / amountBuy)
